ChangeList.Description: Added the **subscriptions** navigation property to the [list](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/list?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.

Added the [followSite](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/site-follow?view=graph-rest-beta) navigation property to the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) entity set

Added the [unfollowSite](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/site-unfollow?view=graph-rest-beta) navigation property to the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) entity set
Added the **analytics** property to the [driveItem](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/driveitem?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the **analytics** property to the [site](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/site?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the **analytics** property to the [listItem](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/listitem?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the **getActivitiesByInterval** function on the [driveItem](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/driveitem?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the **getActivitiesByInterval** function on the [site](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/site?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the **getActivitiesByInterval** function on the [listItem](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/listitem?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the [itemAnalytics](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/itemanalytics?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the [itemActivityStat](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/itemactivity?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the [itemActionStat](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/itemactionstat?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type.
Added the [accessAction](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/accessaction?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type.
Added the [incompleteData](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/incompletedata?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type.
Added the **access** property to the [itemActivity](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/itemactivity?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type.
Added the **location** property to the [itemActivity](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/itemactivity?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type.
The format of the identifier for the **site** resource has changed. This is a breaking change in the beta API.
The sites resource is now avaialble in the v1.0 endpoint.,  Added the **site** and **siteCollection** resource types.

Removed the **sharepoint** navigation properties. Sites are now accessed directly through the **sites** navigation property.  Removed the **fieldDefinition** resource. It has been replaced by **columnDefinition**. Removed the **siteCollectionId** and **siteId** properties from **site**. Use **sharepointIds** instead. Removed the **listItemId** property from **listItem**. Use **sharepointIds** instead. Renamed the **columnSet** property on **listItem** to **fields**. Changed **site** resources to use the SharePoint hostname as part of their ID.

Added the **booleanColumn**, **calculatedColumn**, **choiceColumn**, **dateTimeColumn**, **lookupColumn**, **numberColumn**, **personOrGroupColumn**, and **textColumn** resource types. Added the **displayName** property to **site**. Added the **columns** navigation property to **site**. Added the **list** and **listItem** navigation properties to **sharedDriveItem**. Added the **sharepointIds** property to **list** and **listItem**, and **site**. Added the **columnDefinition** resource type.
Access to SharePoint sites and [lists by ID](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/list-get?view=graph-rest-beta) or path/URL.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: listing, creating, getting, and deleting instances of listItem
ChangeList.Description: Support for [listing, creating, getting, and deleting instances of listItem](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/listitem?view=graph-rest-beta).
ChangeList.Target: listing, creating, getting, and deleting instances of listItem
